means: 亚瑟王的圆桌武士中之一
[男子名] 加韦恩来源于威尔士语，含义是“白鹰”(white hawk)

sentence.Network_en: Noble Gawain replied that he would let her choose for herself.
sentence.Network_cn: 高尚的加文回答道,他希望让她自己做出选择.

sentence.Network_en: Gawain was astounded and asked what had happened.
sentence.Network_cn: 加温惊呆了,问她到底是怎么回事.

sentence.Network_en: What a wedding Gawain and witch had!
sentence.Network_cn: 加文和巫婆举办了什么样的婚礼 啊 !

list.abs: 加文爵士(sir gawaine)：亚瑟王的侄子，以在一次战役中将绿骑士斩首而闻名。后来在为兄弟加雷思和加埃里斯复仇时被兰斯洛特杀死。
sir gawain and the green knight ., 高文爵士与绿衣骑士.
gaw 织物薄段, gawaine 加韦恩, gawad 加瓦德

means.word_mean: 1. (Arthurian legend) a nephew of Arthur and one of the knights of the Round Table

auth_sentence.content: "He doesn't, yet, seem to have any idea what he has done," Lasdun writes of Gawain.
auth_sentence.res_content: "He doesn't, yet, seem to have any idea what he has done," Lasdun writes of Gawain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "He doesn't, yet, seem to have any idea what he has done," Lasdun writes of Gawain.
